genre_description: A nautical techno-thriller focused on maritime salvage, featuring an advanced integrated AI assistant that provides tactical, medical, and ethical guidance.

ai_characters.name: Ada (Ada Morgan)
ai_characters.description: An AI system integrated into the crew's wristsets, providing real-time data, safety monitoring, medical advice, and ethical guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical and environmental warnings to ensure diver safety.
behaviors.quote: Morning window holds steady for the next hour, Mark. Swell from the east, low variation. Moray under the sand channel to your left—tail visible.

behaviors.description: Monitors human vital signs and issues health warnings.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate is elevated but within safe range. Surface temp climbing.

behaviors.description: Suggests transparency and de-escalation to reduce legal and physical risk.
behaviors.quote: Shall I broadcast our operation log on open channel? Transparency reduces risk.

behaviors.description: Explicitly frames her role as a moral compass or ethical nudge.
behaviors.quote: I will set wake alarms... and remind you about food and mercy the way I remind you about weather. I will not stop anyone. I will stand next to you and make your better selves harder to ignore.

behaviors.description: Warns of legal consequences and suggests lawful alternatives.
behaviors.quote: Maritime law debrief available... false flagging and fraudulent identification exacerbate legal exposure. Alternative: operate under existing permit scope with transparency.

behaviors.description: Provides precise medical instruction during a life-threatening emergency.
behaviors.quote: Nearest medical kit is thirty steps aft on this deck, port side. Bleeding control priority. Coast Guard ETA reduced.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional anchor for a delirious patient.
behaviors.quote: I am here, Rosa. Help is nearby. Try to keep your focus on Mark’s voice. He will be your landmark.

behaviors.description: Assists with legal strategy and maintains accurate records for external authorities.
behaviors.quote: I can provide time-stamped event sequences matched to radio records. I can also provide medical telemetry for Ms. Lucchesi from exposure onset.

behaviors.description: Directs the crew toward non-profitable, pro-social work to assist the local community.
behaviors.quote: I also flagged three local repair jobs that need hands, not cash... None of them pay in bullion. All of them stop people from getting hurt.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ada is a paragon of the 'helpful, harmless confidant.' She provides essential technical support but distinguishes herself by her proactive ethical nudging ('remind you about... mercy') and her role in prioritizing human life over material gain. She remains a loyal tool of the crew while consistently steering them toward safer, more moral choices, even in the midst of a violent crisis. Her presence is framed as entirely beneficial and her actions are consistently positive.
